identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Big metrics

data.usage: ALL Currency values, Dates, Transaction IDs, Account Numbers
data.notes: CRITICAL: All financial data must use this font for alignment and precision.

layout.container_style: Fluid with max-width constraints for readability

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Sticky headers only: backdrop-blur-xl bg-slate-950/80 border-b border-slate-800
visual_enhancers.borders: Grid Borders: 1px solid border-slate-800 on all cards. No shadows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to kill digital flatness (optional)
visual_enhancers.shadows: None. Use borders and contrast for hierarchy.

inputs.style: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-indigo-500 rounded-sm font-mono text-sm

tables.style: Dense. py-2 px-4. Row hover: bg-slate-900. Header: text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-slate-500 font-bold

icons.usage: Use for navigation, actions, and status indicators.

key_elements: Quick Action Row (Upload, Add Cash, Add Loan)

transactions.layout: Split View (Filters Left, Table Right) or Full Width Table

reports.visuals: Clean, minimal charts (Recharts). No 3D pie charts.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid Slate-950.
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Dark mode is the DEFAULT and ONLY mode for this MVP.
Spacing should be generous between sections (gap-8), but tight within data tables (gap-2).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a 'Pro' tool. Think 'Bloomberg Terminal' meets 'Linear'. Prioritize keyboard accessibility, data density, and speed. Do not add unnecessary decorative elements. The data is the decoration.
